title: My Mother-In-Law Was A Monster
itunes:title: My Mother-In-Law Was A Monster
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Sometimes it's more than just a cliche...

***

Content Warning: Child Abuse, Violence Towards Pregnant Women

***

Written by Her Creation and narrated by Alicia Atkins

***

To learn more about Hope for Paws visit HopeForPaws.org

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
